name: music-link-converter
title: Music Link Converter
description: Convert a music link to another provider, for example you can convert Spotify links to Apple music links (also works with many other providers), using song.link service.
author: Quentin23Soleil

commands.name: index
commands.title: Convert Music Link to Other Providers
commands.description: Convert a music link to another provider. For example you can convert Spotify links to Apple music links. Also works with many other providers. Using song.link service.
